GK17jvrtmspu:1: vṛttaṃ samam ardhasamaṃ viṣamaṃ cety āmananti vāgīśaḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:4: chandaḥ padaṃ ca paramaṃ sphurati yathāvividhavinyāsaiḥ // JVms_2 //
GK17jvrtmspu:6: vigaṇayituṃ dhīmadbhiḥ kim aparam atrānuyogena // JVms_3 //
GK17jvrtmspu:7: prabhavatu vibhramahataye vicintyamānaṃ tad ādarād bhavatām /
GK17jvrtmspu:8: sukṛtimukhābhijanānāṃ vācāṃ nijam ekam ābharaṇam // JVms_4 //
GK17jvrtmspu:21: vṛttaṃ bhāvi śreyo yasyāṃ sad vā vaiśvam // JVms_10 //
GK17jvrtmspu:27: sūryadhāma duḥsahaṃ sātirekam uṣṇi hi // JVms_13 //
GK17jvrtmspu:29: tanus tava jinānāṃ kumāra lalitaiva // JVms_14 //
GK17jvrtmspu:33: dhīram ekam udīrayanty uttamaṃ padam udgatāḥ // JVms_16 //
GK17jvrtmspu:35: ratnayaṣṭidīpikeva yā samāny abhūj janasya // JVms_17 //
GK17jvrtmspu:37: sphuranty aśeṣanāyaka pramāṇikāpi saiva naḥ // JVms_18 //
GK17jvrtmspu:39: dhatte bhūṣāṃ bhātīyaṃ te 'mbhode yadvad vidyunmālā // JVms_19 //
GK17jvrtmspu:45: viśvam adhīśvara citraṃ citrapadā tava vāṇī // JVms_22 //
GK17jvrtmspu:46: bṛhatyāṃ vibhūtyāṃ ta eke padanyāsam āsādayanti /
GK17jvrtmspu:47: kṣaṇaṃ yatra te labdhalakṣyaḥ kaṭakṣo 'pi viśrāntim eti // JVms_23 //
GK17jvrtmspu:49: bhāti bhūmir iva janatā saṃtatāhitahalamukhī // JVms_24 //
GK17jvrtmspu:50: varada sā hi saṃjanyate pariṇatis tayāsyāṃ yataḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:51: vacanabījam uptaṃ tvayā phalati śāntirūpaṃ phalam // JVms_25 //
GK17jvrtmspu:52: kalayitum iha kaḥ śaktas tava khalu caritānīśa /
GK17jvrtmspu:57: bhāti varṣma buddhātmajapaṅktau yadvad ambujanmasv aravindam // JVms_28 //
GK17jvrtmspu:60: buddhasutānām abhyudayorvī bhāti bhṛśaṃ bhūtyā tava nātha /
GK17jvrtmspu:62: niḥśeṣas tava vijayadhvānaṃ tanvan bhrāmyati bhuvanoddyota /
GK17jvrtmspu:63: sānandaḥ kṛtinivahaḥ svāmin viṣvag ghoṣaṇapaṇavo yadvat // JVms_31 //
GK17jvrtmspu:65: dhīman dhīrān api mādayantī trailokī vāg vilasati mattā // JVms_32 //
GK17jvrtmspu:67: mlāyatīva sā kumāratākhyā yā mayūrasāriṇīṣyate tu // JVms_33 //
GK17jvrtmspu:69: pratyaṅgaṃ tava bhūṣaṇāvalī nītā śuddhavirāṭ parābhavam // JVms_34 //
GK17jvrtmspu:72: rūpaṃ te guṇagaṇam atha kīrtiṃ saṃvīkṣyākhilam idam atiśāyi /
GK17jvrtmspu:73: bibhrāṇaṃ nijaviṣayaviśrāmaṃ mandaṃ triṣṭubhi jagad upajātam // JVms_36 //
GK17jvrtmspu:75: janayati bhavato na kasya vā mudam adhipa samantabhadrikā // JVms_37 //
GK17jvrtmspu:77: guṇasamuditir iva muktālī vilasati hṛdi bhavato vṛttā // JVms_38 //
GK17jvrtmspu:80: sphārāmodā madhunidhir adhikaṃ cūrṇaṃ cātuḥsamaṃ iva dadhatī /
GK17jvrtmspu:82: rūparasāyanabhāvanayā te vāsava eva paraṃ bahumānyaḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:83: yena cirāya nirastanimeṣaṃ labdham adodhakam ambakajātam // JVms_41 //
GK17jvrtmspu:85: dhanyaiḥ suciraṃ caraṇadvayī te vītānyavidheyam upasthiteyam // JVms_42 //
GK17jvrtmspu:86: kim indravibhavair brahmaśriyā vā tato 'py atiśayinyā saṃpadā kim /
GK17jvrtmspu:87: prasidhyati dhiyo 'dhīśa prakāmaṃ tvadaṅghrikamalasyopasthitaṃ cet // JVms_43 //
GK17jvrtmspu:88: tvatsaṃsevāvimukhaṃ janmadurge karmakleśau vivaśaṃ nāśam asmin /
GK17jvrtmspu:89: saṃbhūyālaṃ nayato 'vaśyam ugrau vātormī potam ivāmbhodhimadhye // JVms_44 //
GK17jvrtmspu:92: chede hṛdyā vibhramāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ tūrṇaprāptāv āryasatyāmṛtānām /
GK17jvrtmspu:93: puṇyāvasthā tvatkaṭākṣekṣane 'pi prauḍhaprajñāśālinī kāpy udeti // JVms_46 //
GK17jvrtmspu:95: sāndracandracandrikārdracandana-śyeny alaṅkaroty alaṃ diśo daśa // JVms_47 //
GK17jvrtmspu:100: anantarodbhāvitalakṣaṇāḍhyau pādau bhavetām api gocarau te /
GK17jvrtmspu:101: yāsāṃ dṛśaḥ śravyayatiprapañcau dhanyāḥ surāṇām upajātayas tāḥ // JVms_50 //
GK17jvrtmspu:102: asaṃśayaṃ tvām apareṣu satsv api prakāmasarvātmaguṇānuhāriṣu /
GK17jvrtmspu:103: ananyasādhāraṇayā dhiyādhipā uśanti vaṃśastham anaṅgajiṣṇavaḥ // JVms_51 //
GK17jvrtmspu:106: ativistarair api girāṃ sugiro guṇapāram īyur adhinātha na te /
GK17jvrtmspu:107: nijamodamātrajananīti nutiḥ pramitākṣarāpi subhagaiva mama // JVms_53 //
GK17jvrtmspu:109: bhāratī bhāratīśa svabhāvojjvalā tvām upaiti svayaṃ sadguṇasragviṇī // JVms_54 //
GK17jvrtmspu:110: bhaṅgaṃ nītās te pañcabāṇasya bāṇāḥ śānto dveṣāgnir mohajāḍyaṃ nirastam /
GK17jvrtmspu:111: nātha trailokyānugrahavyagramūrte saṃpat saṃprāptā vaiśvadevī tvayaiva // JVms_55 //
GK17jvrtmspu:112: saṃpūrṇo 'ntar guṇagaṇaratnaiś citrair ambhorāśer yatim atidhairyād dhatse /
GK17jvrtmspu:114: tava puraḥ paramottama saṃmatāḥ pratibhayā vikalāḥ prativādinah /
GK17jvrtmspu:115: sulabhamūkadaśā bahu manyante drutavilambitam apy uditaṃ vacaḥ // JVms_57 //
GK17jvrtmspu:117: prabhavati bhavataś ca kīrtiś ciraṃ suragiriśirasaś ca mandākinī // JVms_58 //
GK17jvrtmspu:118: harati nitāntam iyaṃ tava kīrtiḥ kṛtihṛdayāni dayānijavāsa /
GK17jvrtmspu:119: prasavacayena citeva samantād diśi diśi kundalatā dalatālam // JVms_59 //
GK17jvrtmspu:120: dalayaty upāttaśobhāsamavāyo jagatām aghāni ko 'py eṣa kṛpābdhiḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:123: vilasati śaśvad asir daśāntare tava yamunājalavīcimecakaḥ // JVms_61 //
GK17jvrtmspu:126: aviralamauktikaprakarabhūṣā harati na kasya cittam iyam īśa /
GK17jvrtmspu:128: tava nātha paraṃ yadi kāntisudhā-jaladhau śramam ujjhati jhātkṛtini /
GK17jvrtmspu:130: varada viratibhāñji vyaktam aṅgāny atibhava bhavitā no 'vaśyam eva /
GK17jvrtmspu:131: tava vacanasudhāyāḥ pānapātraṃ śravaṇayugapuṭo 'yaṃ prītihetuḥ // JVms_65 //
GK17jvrtmspu:132: vṛṇe varam imaṃ tvad ekam atula-prabhāva bhavatān na mādṛśajanaḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:133: bhavantam api yah śrayañ chamasudhā-raseṣu viratir jaḍoddhatagatiḥ // JVms_66 //
GK17jvrtmspu:135: locanotsavavidhāsu tanubhṛtāṃ candra vartma samupaiti bhavabhidām // JVms_67 //
GK17jvrtmspu:137: tava pādāśrayalabdhabuddhisārāḥ sakalāyām api vādirāja gatyām // JVms_68 //
GK17jvrtmspu:138: tava caraṇaparicaraṇarucīnāṃ kim api sukham udayati kṛtirūpam /
GK17jvrtmspu:141: iha mañjughoṣa iti vaḥ prathito vyāj jinamānasaikanalinīkalahaṃsaḥ // JVms_70 //
GK17jvrtmspu:142: vicchedas triṣu yadi duḥsaheṣv amīṣu kleśeṣu sphuṭam aṇuśo 'pi duṣkaraḥ syāt /
GK17jvrtmspu:143: prāpyeta kva nu khalu nātha mūrtir īdṛk trailokīnayanamanaḥpraharṣiṇīha // JVms_71 //
GK17jvrtmspu:144: payonidhau viratim apāṃ vidhāya ca sphuranmahākiraṇakalāparatnadhau /
GK17jvrtmspu:145: bhavādṛśāṃ vapuṣi ca kāntisaṃtatiḥ samīkṣyate yadi rucireyam īdṛśī // JVms_72 //
GK17jvrtmspu:146: mandradhvānair yāmṛtadhārās tvayi ramyā muñcaty uccair visphurati prīṇitabhavye /
GK17jvrtmspu:147: nāthānveti vyaktatayātyantamanojñaṃ varṣāmbhodaṃ saiva yatir mattamayūram // JVms_73 //
GK17jvrtmspu:151: manyāmahe jinanayābharaṇaṃ tavaiva vṛttaṃ vasantatilakaṃ navacūtam eva // JVms_75 //
GK17jvrtmspu:155: damayati bhavato hatāhitavikramā muniyatir aparājitā bhuvanatrayam // JVms_77 //
GK17jvrtmspu:156: pratibhayavapuṣām akaruṇacarita-praśamanavidhaye kva cid api kṛpayā /
GK17jvrtmspu:157: tava bhujaparighāvalir ativiṣamā vilasati vividhapraharaṇakalikā // JVms_78 //
GK17jvrtmspu:159: duṣprāpāhāryaṃ padam abhilaṣatāṃ tac ca tvadbhakter anyā varada na dig asaṃbādhā // JVms_79 //
GK17jvrtmspu:160: bhavataḥ kalāṃ kim api saṃyatair indriyaiḥ kva cid ādarastimitadhīr yadi dhyāyati /
GK17jvrtmspu:161: acirāt svayaṃ varayatīyam enaṃ janaṃ vasudhā dhruvaṃ jaladhiśakvarībhūṣaṇā // JVms_80 //
GK17jvrtmspu:162: svedapūravilasatpulakocchvasitais truṭat-kañcukaṃ dadhati nirdhutam apy amarastriyaḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:163: kāntikamram iva te samitāv atiśakvarī-bandhasāram urukampam anaṅgavijṛmbhitam // JVms_81 //
GK17jvrtmspu:164: anupamaramaṇīyā bhaṅgir aṅgeṣu yasyā harati ratim udārāśeṣarūpāntareṣu /
GK17jvrtmspu:167: bhaṇati mudā pratīṣṭajinabhāra bhāratī svamahimakāminī tava sabhāsu madrakam // JVms_83 //
GK17jvrtmspu:169: bhujatarus tava durgatimārgamahārgalaḥ pramadamanmathanirmathanaḥ sugatapriyaḥ // JVms_84 //
GK17jvrtmspu:171: tava varavijayasamupacitayaśasaḥ śriyam anuharati hi śaradi śaśikalā // JVms_85 //
GK17jvrtmspu:173: vilasati tava śirasi rasalayavatī srag iyam amarapatiyuvativiracitā // JVms_86 //
GK17jvrtmspu:174: na yatipadam ayasi yad atidayadhiyaḥ prathayasi jagati ca parahitakṛtinaḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:175: janayati himacayarucir iti bhavato viyad upahatanijamaṇi guṇanikaraḥ // JVms_87 //
GK17jvrtmspu:176: atiratikarakatha katham iva samiyād aviratanavanavanava tava paramaiḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:177: guṇagaṇaparimitim udadhiṣu yatibhiḥ suyatibhir agaṇitaguṇa maṇinikaraḥ // JVms_88 //
GK17jvrtmspu:178: jayati tava tanur iyam urutarakaruṇa nikhilajagaducitaparibhugavanir iva /
GK17jvrtmspu:180: prati jaḍadhiyam iha samadhikagurudaya mṛdumatir api tava śubhamayasamudaya /
GK17jvrtmspu:181: karatalavinihitakuvalaya kalayati jinakulakuvalayam aviṣamabharam iti // JVms_90 //
GK17jvrtmspu:183: viśvavanodare 'tra ravayatijitajaladaṃ nātha dadhāsy udāram ṛṣabhagajavilasitam // JVms_91 //
GK17jvrtmspu:184: kas tvayi baddhavarmaṇi jagaddhitadhānadhiyā nirvihatapratijña paritāpakaṇaḥ kva cana /
GK17jvrtmspu:185: māravadhūjanasya kamanīyakapolatale yan navapattrabhaṅgaracanālasa eva karaḥ // JVms_92 //
GK17jvrtmspu:186: nirupamaramyarūpa jinajātadṛśvano 'ṣṭau madayati te 'dhikaṃ vidhutaśoka lokapālān /
GK17jvrtmspu:188: guṇānām atyaṣṭiḥ katham iha mamevāstu jagatām iti cchandaḥ svairaṃ pariṇatim avāpat tava tathā /
GK17jvrtmspu:189: yathā tvayy evāsmin paramarasabhedapraṇayanī samudbhūtā bhūtir nikhilasukhaśākhāśikhariṇī // JVms_94 //
GK17jvrtmspu:193: tvadaṅghrikamalāśrayotsavasukhaṃ na ced ādṛtaṃ cirasya jinavaṃśabhāskara kumāra mārair jitam // JVms_96 //
GK17jvrtmspu:194: kalpaśatopapāditamahāphalam iva vihitaṃ cañcalam etad āyur adhipa tvadavanatiparaiḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:195: bhūṣaṇabhavyabhāvagamitaṃ śritagurukaruṇā-digyativaṃśa pattrapatitaṃ kam iva jalaruhaḥ // JVms_97 //
GK17jvrtmspu:196: tava guṇavistarapraṇayapūtavacovibhavaṃ varada sa eka eva sumukho mukham āvahati /
GK17jvrtmspu:197: madhumayasāmadhāma yajuṣā sajuṣānugataṃ śravaṇasudhābhimānabhavanarkkuṭakaṃ ca vidhiḥ // JVms_98 //
GK17jvrtmspu:200: kva cid api bhavadbhītyā bhūripravādimadadvipod-dalana sugatasvāntakṣmābhṛdgabhīraguhāgṛha /
GK17jvrtmspu:201: tribhavanavanādhīśa krīḍārasārṇavasaṃyatā dravati hariṇīvāraṃ mārapracaṇḍamahācamūḥ // JVms_100 //
GK17jvrtmspu:202: durdāntānāṃ damanavidhaye kvāpi kāruṇyavegāt dhatse mūrtiṃ caraṇaśikhayā khyātavikrānta yasyāḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:203: trailokīyaṃ śrutarasabhidākrandanādaikavṛttir mandākrantā vrajati vilayaṃ nātha na svāsthyam āśu // JVms_101 //
GK17jvrtmspu:204: śobhāsaṃpattiḥ śirasi guruṇaikena saivopajātā yā syāt kalpadroḥ śubhaphalanibhaṃ bibhrato bhadrakumbham /
GK17jvrtmspu:205: [vyā]khyānapreṅkhatkarakararuhodbhāsinī bhāti bhartur dorvallī ceyaṃ kusumitalatā vellitevānilena // JVms_102 //
GK17jvrtmspu:206: vṛttam etad aśeṣabuddhakulākalankakalānidher āhitaṃ hṛdi cen mahājaḍahārahāritavān asi /
GK17jvrtmspu:207: jihvayā praṇayīti ced ghanasārasāramadena kiṃ karṇapūram akāri cet [khalu] khaṇḍitaṃ maṇikuṇḍalam // JVms_103 //
GK17jvrtmspu:208: upacitapuṇyasaṃcaya śacīkaratalasukhadaiḥ paricaraṇair atṛptigam iva svam asamamahima[n] /
GK17jvrtmspu:209: maṇimayapādapīṭhaphalakaṃ sphuṭayati bhavataḥ kalitatamālapattram alikān namati śatadhṛtau // JVms_104 //
GK17jvrtmspu:210: parārthe sthāsnūnām atidhṛtimatām īśa viśvānukampā-mukhonmīlannānārasarasapad ākarṇayāvedayāmi /
GK17jvrtmspu:211: daśāṃ tām ādhehi kṣaṇam api guro pāvanīṃ pāvanānāṃ samantadhvāntāni praharasi yayā me 'ghavisphūrjitām // JVms_105 //
GK17jvrtmspu:212: pāyād vo varabuddhavaṃśajaladher vṛddhau sudhādīdhitir mañjuśrīḥ paribhūtamanmathakathaḥ prajñāṅganāsaṃgame /
GK17jvrtmspu:213: bhīmabhrāntivibhāvarīparibhave bibhrad yatiṃ bhāsvato viśvakleśakuraṅgasaṅgaravidhau śārdūlavikrīḍitam // JVms_106 //
GK17jvrtmspu:214: antastrāsāṅkurābhotpalitatanuruhais trailokyavijayā-vasthāṃ te vīkṣya bhagnaṃ suramunivisarair ugragrahanudaḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:215: kāruṇyād udyatasyāpy amalataraśarajjyotsnāparikarād indor bimbād anarghasmitavasuvadanāśeṣapriyakṛtau // JVms_107 //
GK17jvrtmspu:216: bhayabhagnair atidūrato virahiṇāṃ pattraiḥ śrayāyāyatām amarāṇāṃ gurubhaktinirbharamanovyaktau sahāyopamam /
GK17jvrtmspu:217: gaganāmeyarayaṃ yugāntajaladadhvānādhikakṣveditaṃ paritaḥ khaṇḍitamāram astu jagatas tvatsiṃhavikrīḍitam // JVms_108 //
GK17jvrtmspu:219: saṃsṛtau ca nirvṛtau ca śaśvadapratiṣṭhavādināṃ variṣṭha vṛttam īdṛśaṃ tu nāmato 'pi nāparasya siddhim abhyupeti // JVms_109 //
GK17jvrtmspu:221: sphāravibhramaprapañcapañcapañcabāṇajiṣṇubhir daśātmanā sundarījanena cātanoṣi kām api prakāmavismayāṃ śriyam // JVms_110 //
GK17jvrtmspu:222: utkīrṇonnidrakundaprakaram iva dṛśāṃ cārubhaṅgais tribhāgaiḥ svedasrastāṅgarāgasnapitam iva muhuḥ kāntakānticchaṭābhiḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:223: vyāptaṃ vyoma tvadarcārucibhir abhihatāvidya vidyādharībhiḥ saurabhyākṛṣṭahṛṣṭakvaṇadalipaṭalollāsitasragdharābhiḥ // JVms_111 //
GK17jvrtmspu:224: ākṛtijanmavṛttavibhavakramātiśayasaṃpadaḥ sukham iyād īśa digantagītam amalaṃ yaśaś ca śaradindusundarataram /
GK17jvrtmspu:225: gāyati yas tavāhvayamayaṃ sadaiva bhagavan bhavādhvagajano nūnam agamyagaurava girāṃ guro guṇasamudra madrakam idam // JVms_112 //
GK17jvrtmspu:226: madhvāsārasnātodbhrāntaprabalamadamukkharamadhukaranikaraṃ prīter ekaṃ līlāvāsaṃ viditabalam api munihṛdayavikṛtaḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:227: vāgīśāna tvayy ekāntaṃ vasuviṣayaviratisamupacitabaliḥ saṃbhogaśrīmattākrīḍaṃ varada divi niyatam anubhavati // JVms_113 //
GK17jvrtmspu:229: pravararathādhirūḍhasubhaṭaṃ balaṃ balanidhe tvadekaśaraṇaṃ śrayati naraṃ manoharayatipraveśavaśagottamāśvalalitam // JVms_114 //
GK17jvrtmspu:230: prītinivāsaṃ kṛtibhuvi viditodāravarapradavarivasanaṃ tvāṃ yaḥ smaratīśa pratihatavimatiḥ saṃtatam antimapadam uditeṣu /
GK17jvrtmspu:231: yauvanalīlāsacivasamudayatpañcamakasvarayatiramaṇīyā syād iha tanvī himakaravadanā tadvaśagā saha narapatilakṣmyā // JVms_115 //
GK17jvrtmspu:232: viśvahitaikāsaṅgasahāntaḥkaraṇakaraṇa vasupadam iva paramāṃ yo 'dhipa gṛhṇātīha tavākhyāṃ tam abhi kṛtivasatir api bhuvi sarasī /
GK17jvrtmspu:234: dhvāntadhvaṃsin mārārāte hatavṛjina jinatanayabhūvibhūṣaṇam utkṛtau prauḍhonmīlallāvaṇyaśrīḥ sthitijanaka giri bhavabhidām udāraparākrama /
GK17jvrtmspu:235: tvayy ārabdho vandhyārādho vidhurayati varada sudhiyāṃ virājatayā sphuran bhogāsakto 'pīha svairaṃ viṣamatamaviṣayatanubhṛdbhujaṅgavijṛmbhi tam // JVms_117 //
GK17jvrtmspu:236: tanvat susphuṭam aviratam amitam amṛtarasakaṇam iva parito 'ṅgeṣu pratyālocanasamudayi navarasarasapadam asadṛśam atulaśrīkam /
GK17jvrtmspu:237: yat kṛcchrair api na sulabham aparavividhasukṛtavidhibhir abhiyuktātmā tvatsevātaruphalam iha samanubhavati tad akhilavipadapavāhākhyam // JVms_118
GK17jvrtmspu:239: anibhṛtabhujadaṇḍaṣaṇḍapracaṇḍānilollāsitaḥ śrāntiśāntiṃ tanotīva te pralayasamayaśaṅkayā yatra lokatrayīdaṇḍakaś caṇḍavṛṣṭiprayāto 'mbudaḥ
GK17jvrtmspu:240: pratipadam iha jātaśuddheḥ samādhes trayasyākṣarasyābhisaṃvardhanād antyarūpaspṛśaḥ samadhigamavaśāj jayaty āryavaryaiḥ prabhūtapramodaiḥ pragītaḥ prabhāprakarṣas tava /
GK17jvrtmspu:241: varada yadanumodanāvādasārāviṇātṛptacittaiḥ surair vādyamānā na yāntiśramaṃ aparimaparamopakārottamarṇārṇavavyālajīmūtalīlākaroddāmaśaṅkhādayaḥ
GK17jvrtmspu:242: pravikacakanakapaṅkejasaubhāgyabhāgaṅga dattenabhāvāśritebhyas tamaḥsu tribhuvanaśamavidhānāya nirvāṇanīvṛt tamālākṛtāv āttabhakte bhavārau
GK17jvrtmspu:243: daśabalatanayavargāgrimeṇa tvayā nātha nirmāthiduḥkhāpahena stutena pracita iti śubharāśir mahān yas tataḥ stāj janaughe samṛddhiḥ samagre 'pi saiva // JVms_121 //
GK17jvrtmspu:245: akaruṇakaruṇābalāvāryavīryodayārabdhanānāvidhavyāpṛtivyastamāras trijagati paramopakāraikakṛtyapravṛttaś careyaṃ jano yāvad eko 'py amuktaḥ
GK17jvrtmspu:254: idam ardham abālaśaśiprabhaṃ bālaraviprabham ādadhad ardham /
GK17jvrtmspu:255: karuṇāvaśavarti bhavadvapuḥ kasya mano na karoty upacitram // JVms_125 //
GK17jvrtmspu:257: tvaccaraṇānubhuvā bhavitavyaṃ bhavamathanaśruta na drutam adhyā // JVms_126 //
GK17jvrtmspu:258: kim uśanti budhā adhikaṃ vibho yadi janīya tadīyatanur bhavet /
GK17jvrtmspu:260: iyam urukaruṇārasā mukhaśrīḥ samadhigatā nijadhīśriyo rasena /
GK17jvrtmspu:262: mukham idam aparaṃ tavotpala-prakararucām iva bhāti saṃcayaḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:263: samuditam iva kairavaśriyā harati mano 'paravaktram iva // JVms_129 //
GK17jvrtmspu:264: idam ardhasamaṃ samīkṣyate te bata vṛttaṃ jayino jagattrayasya /
GK17jvrtmspu:265: kva cid arthavidhau vidhūtaviśvā śiśulīlā lalitāpi yat taveyam // JVms_130 //
GK17jvrtmspu:266: padam ekam avekṣya te kṣaṇaṃ prasabhākrānta jagattrayīśikham /
GK17jvrtmspu:267: katham astu na viśvabhāratī nijadāsīva tava priyaṃvadā // JVms_131 //
GK17jvrtmspu:268: svarasopanatāṃ śamaśayyāṃ kiṃ nu vidhūya dhiyo 'py atidurgaiḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:269: aticitracaritraśatais te vegavatī karuṇā yadi na syāt // JVms_132 //
GK17jvrtmspu:271: lokasya gatāpi hi smṛtiṃ te bhadraṃ bhadravirāṭ tanus tanoti // JVms_133 //
GK17jvrtmspu:273: pavipadmakhaḍgamaṇicakraiḥ ketumatī vibhāti tava mūrtiḥ // JVms_134 //
GK17jvrtmspu:274: caittamātrabhāvabhāji bhāvyate kva parā parārthasaṃpad īdṛśī dayāyām /
GK17jvrtmspu:275: seyam etadākṛticchalād ato 'va-yavadhvaner matupstriyā samābhidhānā // JVms_135 //
GK17jvrtmspu:277: jayati nikhilajagadabhiratikṛtipaṭur atibhava tava tanur iyam atirucirā // JVms_136 //
GK17jvrtmspu:280: samudayadiśi samupanataruciṣu vividhasamudayakaraṇam abhidadhatī praśamasukharasarasikamatiṣu nirupamaśamasukhapathakathanapṛthuniratiḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:281: aparimitasukṛtaphalam adhipa tava jayati sakalajinanayanayanagīr ṛjumatiṣu niyatam ṛjur amṛtakuṭa kuṭilamatiṣu niratiśayakuṭilapadā // JVms_138
GK17jvrtmspu:282: ākhyānikeyaṃ bhavato guṇānām iti stuvaṃs tvām abhimanyate yaḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:283: nūṇaṃ sa gaṇḍūṣajalopayogān mayā nipīto 'mbudhir ity aveti // JVms_139 //
GK17jvrtmspu:284: api tv aśeṣasmaravairiṇām apy ākhyeyatākhyātim anāśriteṣu /
GK17jvrtmspu:285: guṇeṣu te nātha vṛthābhimānasya-ākhyānikāsau viparītapūrvā // JVms_140 //
GK17jvrtmspu:288: guṇasāgara sāgarair apūritāṅgurīgarto viṣamaṃ daśāntare dayā padacaturūrdhvaṃ nayati bhāvam // JVms_141 //
GK17jvrtmspu:290: laghuguruniyatibhṛti bhayam ayati ko na bhavasi na yadi niyatam abhividhivacanam anu pīḍaḥ // JVms_142 //
GK17jvrtmspu:294: prasabham abhimukhaṃ te praśamayati śamanam api nayanavalanalavalīlā // JVms_144 //
GK17jvrtmspu:295: mṛdujanam anu punar iyam eva praśamitasakalakaṭukaluṣaviṣarāśiḥ /
GK17jvrtmspu:296: pratimuhur abhinavam atulasukhanidhim upanayantī niyatam amṛtadhāra // JVms_145 //
GK17jvrtmspu:299: ghoraghanarasitam īśa tanuḥ kṛpayā kuto 'pi jayatīyam udgatā // JVms_146 //
GK17jvrtmspu:301: hlādayaty akhilalokam idaṃ paṭukīrtisaurabhakam adbhutaṃ tava // JVms_147 //
GK17jvrtmspu:303: damayati tava bhuvanāni vapur lalitaṃ ca kiṃ tu vikaṭaṃ yad īdṛśam // JVms_148 //
GK17jvrtmspu:306: marud anatiśayarayaḥ pracupitam api tava na sameti salīlam // JVms_149 //
GK17jvrtmspu:307: kiṃ bhūyo bhagavan bhavantam aśrayam āptaḥ sthitabhāram atulam ārṣabhaṃ dadhānam /
GK17jvrtmspu:308: tac chuddhavirāḍviśeṣaṇam hy aparaviṣamaśirasi padaṃ vinidhatte // JVms_150 //
GK17jvrtmspu:309: ārādhyeti bhavantam āśrayaikasamṛddhyā kuśalaṃ yad amalam asti vardhamānam /
GK17jvrtmspu:310: tat idam akhilam udañcatu bhuvanam urupadaṃ tvadabhimatam ativividhavṛttaviśeṣaiḥ // JVms_151 //
GK17jvrtmspu:311: api ca pracayena bhūyasā kuśalasyāsya nikamanirmalasya /
GK17jvrtmspu:315: uḍupatiruciranicayamayam iva vapur anatiśayakaruṇam iha vahad anubhavatu // JVms_153 //
GK17jvrtmspu:317: vicitravṛttair iti varṇanena yad ācitaṃ candrakarāmalaṃ śubham /
